name: get_standings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_esports.
Tool description: This api gives you all of the lol esports leagues , vods, tournaments, match , game , event details with videos , scheadule , standings, teams and their players. And live game score.
API description: In this api method you can get all standings for tournaments. You can get tournaments id Get Tournaments From League method.

tournamentid.description: The ID of the tournament for which standings are to be fetched.
